author: Brandjuhnl
install_msg: Thank you for installing Rapid Response Dispatch! Use `[p]rr admin setchannel` to set up the mission channel, then players can use `[p]rr status on` to start playing. This cog requires the Red bank system to be configured.
name: RapidResponse
description: A fully automated Discord game based on real MissionChief missions. Players manage their own emergency station, respond to incidents using buttons, level up stats, and compete on leaderboards. Features multi-stage missions, automatic assignment, training system, and full Red bank integration.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs, mission history, player stats, and game progress data in a local SQLite database.
